About Me

Hi, I am Akash — a 15-year-old self-taught web enthusiast who builds tools to solve everyday problems. I love coding, math, and creating simple systems that help people list, sell and collaborate online. This website is a step in that direction.

Why I built Your Digital Market

I noticed many small sellers struggle to reach customers and needed a simple, trustworthy place to list products and manage approvals. I built this platform to make listing and collaborating easy — with clear steps and a human-first review process.

Key Problems I Faced

ProblemDifficulty to list without technical help
ProblemLack of simple approval workflow for quality control
ProblemNew sellers confused about how to present their product

Solutions I Implemented

  • Step-by-step submit & approval flow (admin review)
  • Easy visual listing pages for products and stores
  • Front-end simulator (approve → list) using localStorage
  • Clean, mobile-friendly design that focuses on clarity
